My word count was bang on 1500 lol

Actually an enjoyable read - I guess that's _one_ thing you could do with a Z-Drive...

On a side, I like the emergent narrative you've exposed around it: I'm sure many people in Runeterra, for selfish or selfless reasons alike, would love to get their hands on such an invention. There's a whole heap of room for a future story revolving around Ekko and people who want to take his gizmo for themselves.

I wanted to paint the picture that even though this is a world of fantasy, there's still a lot of ordinary things we don't know about. When strange is the norm, than average becomes extraordinary. I think I did an alright job, but we'll see how it fares in the competition. :)

definitely one of the top 3 stories

It's so sweet, I developed holes in my teeth! I really enjoyed the idea, pacing and voice in this. It's so fuzzy, like an old-school school romance :) I do feel that there are a bit too many ellipses and losing some would make the flow much smoother and cleaner, but that's a minor thing in this heartwarming piece. Thank you for sharing :)
Hey this is clever :D you really make this narrative technique work. Very well told!
